title: 7.3.1 Create cost findings database schema
body:
## Parent Issue
#31 - 7.3 Cost Analysis Scanner

## Objective
Create database schema for cost findings and summaries.

## Tables
- cost_findings: Individual cost optimization opportunities
- cost_summaries: Aggregate spend data per scan

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/models/cost_finding.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/models/cost_summary.py`
- `alembic/versions/xxx_create_cost_tables.py`

## Estimated Time: 1.5 hours
